entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near noon. High 9. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Sunday 30 April 2023
